metadata.title: CVE-2024-24863 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ** REJECT ** This CVE ID has been rejected or withdrawn by its CVENumbering Authority. CVE-2024-24863 has been replaced by CVE-2024-36014.
